author: Doug Bostrom
content:

author: glenwood
content:
Enjoyed this article.
Living on the west coast near the Columbia River, the shipwrecks here are a part of our history stories. This article brings to light a similar lifestyle and the dangers of sailing the Great Lakes.
We think of our west coast as the land of trees, but many of our early loggers and lumber mill owners migrated from the Great Lakes country.
